code: @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") @Test public void testReadSize() throws Exception {     mock.expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "select * from customer").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().     List list = mock.getExchanges().get(0).getIn().getBody(ArrayList.class).     assertEquals(1, list.size()). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("jdbc:dataSource?readSize=1").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
